intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: These General Terms of Service (hereinafter "Terms") govern the use of the Quickfund platform and services. By using our services, you agree to these Terms in their entirety.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.platformDef: The Quickfund website and mobile application
definitions.borrowerDef: A User who has entered into a credit agreement with Quickfund
definitions.creditDef: Any loan or financing granted by Quickfund
definitions.servicesDef: All services offered by Quickfund, including credit, simulation, and financial coaching

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not use our services.

services.title: Services Offered
services.intro: Quickfund offers the following credit and financial services:
services.proCredit: Professional credit: €1,000 to €10,000, for freelancers and small businesses
services.studentLoan: Student loan: financing for studies without traditional bank guarantee
services.salaryAdvance: Salary advance: access part of your salary before payday
services.coaching: Financial coaching: budget management and personalized advice

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.intro: To use our credit services, you must:
eligibility.residence: Be a resident of Estonia or the European Union

application.title: Application Process
application.content: Credit applications are submitted online via our Platform. You must provide accurate and complete information. Quickfund reserves the right to request additional documents. Each application is subject to creditworthiness assessment. Approval is not guaranteed and depends on our analysis.

creditTerms.title: Credit Terms
creditTerms.content: The specific terms of each credit are detailed in the individual credit agreement, including:

obligations.title: Your Obligations
obligations.intro: As a User and/or Borrower, you agree to:
obligations.update: Update your information if it changes
obligations.repay: Make payments on time according to the agreed schedule
obligations.notify: Notify us of any difficulties in making payments

withdrawal.title: Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.content: For consumer credit, you have the right to withdraw from the credit agreement within 14 calendar days from the date of signing, without providing any reason. To exercise this right, you must notify us in writing and repay the principal and any accrued interest.

earlyRepayment.title: Early Repayment
earlyRepayment.content: You may repay your credit early, in full or in part, at any time. No early repayment penalty will be charged. You will only owe interest accrued up to the repayment date.

latePayment.title: Late Payment
latePayment.content: In case of late payment, late payment interest may be applied as specified in your credit agreement. We will contact you to find a solution. Persistent non-payment may result in legal recovery procedures and reporting to credit bureaus.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Quickfund shall not be liable for indirect damages, loss of profits, or damages resulting from circumstances beyond our control. Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be communicated via the Platform and/or email. Continued use of our services after modifications constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by Estonian law. Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent courts of Estonia. For EU consumers, mandatory consumer protection laws of your country of residence may also apply.

contact.content: For any questions regarding these Terms:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Quickfund, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Estonian law.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect the following categories of personal data:

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your data based on the following legal grounds:
legalBasis.contractDesc: To provide our credit services and fulfill our contractual obligations
legalBasis.legalDesc: To comply with KYC/AML regulations and financial supervision requirements
legalBasis.consentDesc: For marketing communications and optional services
legalBasis.legitimateDesc: For fraud prevention, security, and service improvement

purposes.title: Purposes of Processing
purposes.creditAssessment: Assessing creditworthiness and making lending decisions
purposes.kyc: Verifying your identity (KYC) and preventing money laundering (AML)
purposes.communication: Communicating with you about your account and services
purposes.improvement: Improving our services and user experience
purposes.legal: Complying with legal and regulatory obligations

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.intro: We may share your data with:
sharing.stripeDesc: For payment processing and identity verification (KYC)
sharing.cloudDesc: For secure data storage (Google Cloud Platform, European servers)
sharing.authoritiesDesc: When required by law (FSA Estonia, tax authorities)

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your data for the following periods:
retention.contract: Contract data: Duration of the credit + 5 years
retention.kyc: KYC documents: 5 years after end of relationship

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:
security.encryption: Encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS) and at rest
security.storage: Data stored exclusively in the European Union

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.accessDesc: Request a copy of your personal data
rights.erasureDesc: Request deletion of your data (subject to legal retention requirements)
rights.restrictionDesc: Limit how we use your data
rights.portabilityDesc: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
rights.objectionDesc: Object to processing based on legitimate interest
rights.exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us at legal@quickfund.ee or legal@quickfund.fr

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your data is stored and processed within the European Economic Area (EEA). We do not transfer your data outside the EEA. Our cloud infrastructure is located in European data centers.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through our Platform. The date of the last update is indicated at the top of this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your rights:
contact.authority: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Estonian Data Protection Inspectorate (Andmekaitse Inspektsioon) or your local supervisory authority.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Information
regulatory.euPassportDesc: Authorized to operate in the European Union
regulatory.content: Quickfund OU is a licensed credit institution supervised by the Estonian Financial Supervision Authority (Finantsinspektsioon). Under EU regulations, we are authorized to provide credit services throughout the European Union through the EU passport mechanism.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on this website is protected by intellectual property rights. The following elements are the exclusive property of Quickfund OU:
ip.content2: All texts, articles, and editorial content

links.title: External Links
links.content: This website may contain links to external websites. Quickfund is not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these third-party sites. Accessing these links is at your own risk.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: While we strive to ensure the accuracy of information on this website, Quickfund cannot guarantee that all information is complete, accurate, or up-to-date. We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of this website.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.content: We are committed to making our website accessible to all users. If you encounter any accessibility issues, please contact us at legal@quickfund.ee so we can address them.

applicableLaw.title: Applicable Law
applicableLaw.content: This website and these legal notices are governed by Estonian law. Any dispute relating to the use of this website shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Estonian courts.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This Cookie Policy explains how Quickfund OU uses cookies and similar technologies on our website. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, provide information to website owners, and improve user experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.desc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.desc: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.desc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies:

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.content: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings:
manage.warning: Please note that disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality.

consent.title: Cookie Consent
consent.content: When you first visit our website, you will be asked to accept or configure cookies. You can change your preferences at any time through our cookie settings or by clearing your browser cookies.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:
